attributes.action: David Cameron to take back his resignation and at least finish his term.
attributes.additional_details: The candidates which are running to take his place will not do this country any justice and will send us to a place where we may not recover from. David Cameron needs to stay on until the next election and in the meantime let's see what the other candidates have to offer.
attributes.background: In light of the EU referendum United Kingdom has voted out. We need a strong leader, a leader who has experience, a leader who can take this decision in his stride and help the people of United Kingdom feel secure & safe. This ship does need him!
